name: Collider (itch) (cardvark61)
description:
This is a short game that I made for the GDevelop jam. This was my first real game in the engine, so don't expect too much.

Controls:

-The red and blue balls will constantly move towards the mouse. If they collide, you will take damage

-After dying, you can click on upgrades in the menu to improve your chances of survival

-You will win the game after surviving for 60 seconds straight

Known Bugs:

-I already know that the drift upgrade does not cost any money
